profile:
Here at FV RENOVATIONS, we offer very competitive rates for our elite services.With customer satisfaction being our main priority, we pride ourselves in the belief that our job is not complete until our customers are fully satisfied.
​
At FV RENOVATIONS, we strive to excel in our service. So when you hire us, you can be confident that you will receive the personal touch that only our skilled team can offer.
 
OFFERING UNBEATABLE PRICES FOR TOP-QUALITY SERVICE

At FV RENOVATIONS, customer satisfaction is the ultimate responsibility of all our employees.
Our commitment is to provide excellent services that will excel far beyond your expectations.By maintaining strong and friendly communication with our customers,
we continue to enhance the value and quality of our work to ensure you are completely satisfied.
 
 
Client satisfaction is not just a goal for us - it is an action plan in progress.
​
We don’t just believe in it - we live by it!  
 
FV RENOVATIONS -"QUALITY IS OUR STANDARD"

profile:
AK home star builders
A name you can trust. 
Building Solid, Beautiful & Unique Living Spaces in Toronto 
AK Home Star builders serving GTA and surrounding area for more than 15 years with its professional crew. The Company has been taking major design and build, renovation, and remodeling projects. We deal with all kinds of projects, from small washroom renovation, landscaping to building custom houses and smart home automation. You can trust our service and the quality we provide. We always use environment-friendly products which are beneficial for all our health. With this, we also help you to renovate your home. We are a leading Builders in GTA which has satisfied many clients and we look forward to satisfying more with our service. We always go budget-friendly. We have experts who help with Home Renovations. 
We have a one of a kind Showroom right in Toronto. For all your building and construction needs we can assist. For your dream yard or home we have it covered. Our design experts and construction group will handle any size project you have. 
We offer services both for residential and commercial. Our services includes as fellow

-Maintenance & Improvement of House, Condo, Offices
-Complete home renovation & design
-Home automation
-Kitchen Renovation & Remodeling
-Custom kitchen cabinets

profile:
Experienced, Knowledgeable, On Time, On Budget.

Throughout Southern Ontario CMH Demolition provide demolition services for a wide variety of project types. Home, Business, Condominium Corporations, Property Owners, Sub-Contractors, General Contractors, Regional Municipal Government … we’ve helped them all!  

When calling CMH, you can depend on getting professional service and the best possible price. Our customers count on us providing knowledgeable advice. Homeowners that are renovating the kitchen, basement, garage, shed, the back-yard need advice on the best way to get the job done right. Business Owners looking to make facility changes want the work done quickly, efficient and safely so they can get production back on track. Warehouse’s needing walls removed with emphasis on dust control. Contractors downtime is expensive; working with demo crews that get the job on time and on budget keeps them profitable. Property owners of all kinds either want to get the space ready for their next tenant or make changes to their facility in a timely manner. Its not just about the demolition at had but understanding customers and their concerns.       

You’ll be glad you called CMH – we are customer oriented and can respond quickly with any inquiry you may have. 

CMH Demolition provides demolition services with all crews individually registered under WSIB & General Insurance … with hundreds of jobs under our belt theirs not much we haven’t demolished! 

CMH Demolition; building a reputation of reliability one demo at a time!
name: Cmh Demolition
